writer.name: 塞西尔·瓦尔加夫蒂 Cécile Vargaftig

this_title: Bernadette Lafont et Dieu créa la femme libre
trans_title: 伯纳黛特和上帝创造了自由的女人
introduction: A journey with Bernadette Lafont, the most atypical French film actress. The film sweeps her life and stunning artistic career.Her granddaughters go back to Bernadette's dreams and her friends Bulle Ogier and Jean-Pierre Kalfon evoke their artistic and human complicity.Throughout the film Bernadette Lafont with her unmistakable voice of character actress weaves the movie of her life.
chinese_title: 伯纳黛特和上帝创造了自由的女人
foreign_title: Bernadette Lafont et Dieu créa la femme libre
